CustomField.description: This custom field helps bucket calls as voicemail, abandoned, or answered.
CustomField.formula: If(ringdna__Voicemail__c = True, "Voicemail", If(ringdna__Abandoned_Call__c = True, "Abandoned", IF(AND(ringdna__Abandoned_Call__c = False,ringdna__Voicemail__c = False), "Answered", "other")))
CustomField.label: RingDNA Status
